attributes.title: Paramashiva - My Bholenath, My Puppet Baba || 08 Jan 2021
attributes.description:
*SHAKTI PADA AND SHAKTINI PADA WITH THE LIVE DARSHAN OF SPH, JGM, HDH BHAGAVAN NITHYANANDA PARAMASHIVAM ON THE AUSPICIOUS OCCASION OF THE 11TH DAY OF THE ONGOING 21-DAY ‘NITHYANANDOTSAVA’, THE 44TH AVATARA DINA DINOTSAVA (BIRTHDAY) CELEBRATIONS OF SPH, JGM, HDH BHAGAVAN NITHYANANDA PARAMASHIVAM.

SPH WELCOMED ALL THE IMPORTANT PEOPLE WHO JOINED TODAY AS PART OF 44TH BIRTHDAY CELEBRATIONS (AVATARA MAHOTSAVA). 

SRI KANDAN, OWNER OF DEEPAM TV 
SRI GOPAL MANI, SECRETARY OF ALL INDIA THULUVA VELLALAR

*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA:

*SUPERCONSCIOUS EXISTENCE IS YOUR PRIMARY PRINCIPLE WHICH SUPERSEDES YOUR SELF DOUBT, SELF DENIAL, SELF HATRED. 

*YOUR CONSCIOUS SANKALPA, CONSCIOUS DECISIONS HAVE TO MANIFEST. THEY DON'T HAVE DEATH.

*THERE IS ONLY ONE COMPONENT IN YOU THAT CAN DIE. IT IS YOUR SELF DOUBT, SELF HATRED, SELF DENIAL (SDHD). 

*OTHER THAN YOUR SDHD AND DELUSIONS BASED ON SDHD, NOTHING ELSE HAS DEATH / END IN YOUR EXISTENCE.

*YOUR EXISTENCE IS LIKE AN ETERNAL SUN - NITHYA SURYA

*YOUR SDHD / DELUSION IS LIKE A CLOUD. 

*ONLY DELUSIONS AND SDHD HAVE AN END OR CONCLUSION IN YOUR LIFE, NOT YOUR SUPERCONSCIOUS EXISTENCE.

*SOMETIMES, MY DISCIPLES, THE NITHYA SATSANGIS WHO COME REGULARLY TO SATSANG TELL ME, ‘SWAMIJI SOMETIMES WE FEEL SAME IDEAS ARE BEING REPEATED.’ IT WILL BE REPEATED TILL YOUR ENLIGHTENMENT, TILL YOU MANIFEST IT.

*TODAY MEDITATE ON / COGNISE THIS ONE POWERFUL COGNITION: 
*YOUR SUPERCONSCIOUS EXISTENCE HAS NO DEATH, NO DESTRUCTION. 
*ALL THE CONSCIOUS DECISIONS YOU MAKE, HAVE TO MANIFEST!
*ONLY YOUR SDHD AND DELUSIONS FROM SDHD HAVE AN END, CONCLUSION. NEVER YOUR CONSCIOUS EXISTENCE OR CONSCIOUS SANKALPA. 

*YOU WILL EXPERIENCE SUPERCONSCIOUS MIRACLES. 

*WHETHER YOU WANT TO ATTRACT HEALTH, WEALTH, HAPPY RELATIONSHIPS, LOVE, COMPLETION, ENLIGHTENMENT,  POWERS, ANYTHING  YOU WANT TO MANIFEST TODAY, KEEP THIS POWERFUL COGNITION AND START MANIFESTING!

*LIFE WILL BE MAGICAL, NOT JUST ORDINARY LOGICAL.

*THE PRINCIPLE WHICH I AM TEACHING YOU  IS THE ROYAL PRINCIPLE WITH WHICH PARAMASHIVA MANIFESTED KAILASA ITSELF THROUGH ME. 

*HE GAVE THESE VERY SECRETS TO ME AND MANIFESTED KAILASA. 

*TODAY, IS THE DAY DEDICATED TO MY OWN GURU - ARUNAGIRI YOGISHWARA. 

*I AM JUST IN ECSTASY! 

*HE IS NOT ONLY MY PUPPY LOVE, BUT MY PUPPET LOVE.

*PUPPET LOVE MEANS (IT IS THE WORD WHICH I CREATED ON MY OWN) - HOW I CAN PLAY WITH MY OWN PUPPETS AS I WANT. I WILL LOVE IT WHEN I WANT, KEEP IT ASIDE WHEN I WANT AND AGAIN, PICK IT UP AND SPEND TIME WITH IT. IT WILL NEVER COMPLAIN.

*IT WILL NOT SAY:  YESTERDAY YOU SPENT TWO HOURS WITH ME. TODAY YOU DID NOT EVEN TOUCH ME. 

*TODAY I CAN DRESS HIM UP LIKE A KING AND PLAY. NEXT ONE WEEK I MAY NOT EVEN SEE HIM BECAUSE I AM BUSY WITH SOMETHING ELSE. 

*HE HAS ABSOLUTELY NO EXPECTATION  / COMMITMENT FROM ME BUT HAS EXTREME TYAGA AND GIVING FOR ME. THAT IS WHAT IS PUPPET LOVE. 

*HE NEVER COMPLAINED OR SHOWED IN ANY REMOTE CORNER OF THE HEART ANY EXPECTATION / SADNESS / ANGER, NOTHING. NO NEGATIVITY.

*IN THE MODERN LANGUAGE IF I HAVE TO TELL: I CAN BLOCK HIM WHEN I WANT AND RESTART CONVERSATION WITH HIM ANY TIME I WANT AND HE WILL RESPOND AS IF NOTHING HAPPENED.

*MOST SWEETEST!

*I AM NOT SAYING I AM A PUPPET IN HIS HAND. HE IS A PUPPET IN MY HAND! 

*IN REALITY I REALISED MUCH AFTER IN MY PUPPET LOVE WITH HIM, THAT I HAVE BECOME A PUPPET IN HIS HAND JUST BY HIS EXTREME SACRIFICE.

*FIRST, HE STARTED BECOMING A PUPPET IN MY HAND. SO I FELL IN LOVE WITH HIM SO MUCH. THEN, SIMPLY EVEN WITHOUT MY KNOWLEDGE, I HAVE BECOME A PUPPET IN HIS HAND!

*MY GURU IS NOT JUST PUPPY LOVE FOR ME. HE IS EVEN PUPPET LOVE - BARBIE DOLL FOR ME. 

*IN THE INITIAL LEVEL, I FELT HE IS MY PUPPET. 

*THROUGH HIS SACRIFICE, EXTRAORDINARY LOVE, I FELL FOR HIM SO MUCH. I LOST MY INDIVIDUAL IDENTITY IN HIM. I DIDN'T REALISE, LONG BEFORE I HAVE BECOME A PUPPET IN HIS HANDS. 

*நாடகத்தை நடத்துபவனே இங்கு நாயகனாகவும் மாறி கூத்தனே இங்கு கூத்தையும் நடத்தி செய்யும் பரமசிவ லீலை  (NADAGATHAI NADATHUBAVANE INGU NAYAGANAAGAVUM MAARI, KOOTHANE INGU KOOTHAYUM NADATHI, SEYYUM PARAMASHIVA LEELAI!) 

*UNDERSTAND THIS TRUTH: LOVE HAS A CAPACITY TO BREAK ALL THE BARRIERS NOT JUST AMONG THE HUMANS BUT ALL THE 14 LOKAS UP AND DOWN. 





Get Your Free E-Passport at join.kailaasa.org and receive all the gifts to live enlightenment!
